page.description: GeneratePng returns a blob containing the contents of a .PNG formatted QRCode image.
page.syntax: PUBLIC STATIC GeneratePng AS B (text AS C, flags AS C)

argument.name: flags AS C
argument.description: Correction level can be L,M,Q or H (L=7%, M=15%, Q=25%, H=30%).

page.example: dim pngData as b = ::QRCode::Creator::GeneratePng("Hello world","M") dim html as c = "< img src=\"data:image/png;base64," + base64encode(pngData)+"\" />" a5_show_html(html)
